price: Wakasema: Ni mamoja kwetu, ukitupa mawaidha au hukuwa miongoni mwa watoao mawaidha.
arabic: قَالُواْ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيۡنَآ أَوَعَظۡتَ أَمۡ لَمۡ تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡوَٰعِظِينَ
footnotes: Wakasema kwa kumkejeli: Ni sawa kwetu, ukitupa waadhi na kutuonya au ukawa si katika wenye kutoa waadhi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qālū sawāon ʿalaynā awaʿaẓta am lam takun mina al-wāʿiẓīna
